entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning near noon. Snow level 2000 metres rising to 2300 metres this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 11. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries after midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Snow level 2300 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
